snippet.title: East India Company Collection Trailer
snippet.description: In East India Company, you assume the role of Governor Director and seek to ship precious cargo to Europe in order to amass vast wealth. Build your fleet, establish connections to distant countries, and dominate the other rival empires. With mighty fleets at your command, the power to choose between diplomacy and war is yours.  Fight, Manage, Rule.
